text: There is also a rust version (called stretch) from Visly which is more embeddeable. I prefer the flutter/swiftui layout model which is much easier to use in a visual programming context - the druid toolkit has an interesting implementation. Figma also has a pretty nice autolayout plus constraint system which can be used to build live UI -- see <https://github.com/treeform/fidget>

attachments.title: treeform/fidget
attachments.text: Figma based UI library for nim, with HTML and OpenGL backends. - treeform/fidget
